void * im_

Detailed Description

Incoming message.

The proxy allowing to inspect the details of the incoming message and sent back replies or rejection notifications.

The user code interacts with objects of this type mainly in the callbacl handlers that are provided during object registration and that are later called back when the incoming message arrives.

Note: The objects of this class are not supposed to be used from multiple threads. They are also created for the purpose of a single callback

  • if they are not explicitly retained, they are automatically released when the incoming message callback returns.

Member Function Documentation

- (NSString *) messageName

Returns the message name.

Returns:
The return value is newly allocated and should be managed by the caller.
- (NSString *) objectName

Returns the destination object name.

Returns:
The return value is newly allocated and should be managed by the caller.
- (YAMI4Parameters *) parameters

Provides access to the message content.

Returns:
The return value is newly allocated and should be managed by the caller.
- (void) reject

Sends back the rejection (exception) notification.

Sends back the rejection to the message identified by this object. The rejection is sent with empty reason description and default (0) priority.

- (void) reject: (NSString *)  reason

Sends back the rejection (exception) notification.

Sends back the rejection to the message identified by this object. The rejection is sent with the given reason description and default (0) priority.

- (void) reject: (NSString *)  reason
priority: (size_t)  priority 

Sends back the rejection (exception) notification.

Sends back the rejection to the message identified by this object. The rejection (or reply) can be sent only once.

Parameters:
reasonArbitrary text that will be visible by the message sender as a reason for rejection.
priorityThe priority of the rejection.
- (void) reply

Sends back the reply.

Sends back the reply with empty payload and default (0) priority.

- (void) reply: (YAMI4Parameters *)  parameters

Sends back the reply.

Sends back the reply with the given payload and default (0) priority.

- (void) reply: (YAMI4Parameters *)  parameters
priority: (size_t)  priority 

Sends back the reply.

Sends back the reply to the message identified by this object. The reply (or rejection) can be sent only once.

Parameters:
parametersThe content of the reply.
priorityThe priority of the reply.
- (NSString *) source

Returns the source of this incoming message.

Returns:
The name of the originating endpoint from where this incoming message has been sent. The return value is newly allocated and should be managed by the caller.
